text: Vladimir Mikhailovich Zeldin (; February 10, 1915 - 31 October 2016) was a Russian theatre and cinema actor. Zeldin was born in the town of Kozlov (now Michurinsk). He is, as of 2014, the oldest living People's Artist of the USSR. He turned 100 in 2015. Zeldin died in Moscow, Russia on 31 October 2016 at the age of 101. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vladimir Zeldin. title: Vladimir Zeldin
